/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and depth to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze, casting dappled shadows on the cobblestone pavement. Bare power lines crisscross above, a testament to the city's infrastructure. Parked cars line the side of the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. People can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The image is a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, capturing the city's unique blend of nature and urban development.
